Package org.reldb.wrapd.sqldb

Class QueryDefiner

java.lang.Object
org.reldb.wrapd.sqldb.QueryDefiner
public class QueryDefiner extends Object
Mechanisms for defining Query classes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    define​(String queryName, String sqlText, Object... args)
    Shorthand for invoking generate(new QueryDefinition(...)).
    void
    generate()
    Scan this class for methods with signature: QueryDefinition query*() (e.g., queryCustomers01) - or - void query*() (which is assumed to invoke define(...)) For each, run the QueryDefinition against the specified Database (see @QueryDefiner's constructor) to create Query subclass that can be passed to a Database for future evaluation.

    Run the QueryDefinition against the specified Database (see @QueryDefiner's constructor) to create Query subclass that can be passed to a Database for future evaluation.

  • Constructor Details

    • QueryDefiner

      public QueryDefiner​(Database database, String codeDirectory, String packageSpec)
      Create a QueryDefiner, given a Database, the directory where Tuple-derived classes will be stored, and their package.
      Parameters:
      database - Database
      codeDirectory - Directory for Tuple-derived classes.
      packageSpec - The package, in dotted notation, to which the Tuple belongs.

  • Method Details

    • getDatabase

      public Database getDatabase()
      Return the Database.
      Returns:
      Database.

    • getCodeDirectory

      public String getCodeDirectory()
      Return directory where code is stored.
      Returns:
      Code directory path.

    • getPackageSpec

      public String getPackageSpec()
      Return the package for generated code.
      Returns:
      Package specification for generated code.

    • generate

      protected void generate​(QueryDefinition definition) throws Exception
      Run the QueryDefinition against the specified Database (see @QueryDefiner's constructor) to create Query subclass that can be passed to a Database for future evaluation.
      Parameters:
      definition - QueryDefinition.
      Throws:
      Exception - Failed.

    • define

      protected void define​(String queryName, String sqlText, Object... args) throws Exception
      Shorthand for invoking generate(new QueryDefinition(...)).
      Parameters:
      queryName - Name of query. Should be unique.
      sqlText - SQL query text.
      args - Arguments that specify parameter type(s) and allow query to succeed.
      Throws:
      Exception - Error.

    • generate

      public void generate() throws QueryDefiner.QueryDefinerException
      Scan this class for methods with signature: QueryDefinition query*() (e.g., queryCustomers01) - or - void query*() (which is assumed to invoke define(...)) For each, run the QueryDefinition against the specified Database (see @QueryDefiner's constructor) to create Query subclass that can be passed to a Database for future evaluation.
      Throws:
      QueryDefiner.QueryDefinerException - if error
